lead_paragraph: Golf's return to the Olympic Games next month for the first time in 112 years has been marred by the absence of the sport's leading players and a court battle over potential environmental damage resulting from a new course in Brazil.

headline.print_headline: Golf's Rio Return Jars Environmentalists, Players Stay Away
headline.main: Golf's Rio Return Jars Environmentalists, Players Stay Away

snippet: Golf's return to the Olympic Games next month for the first time in 112 years has been marred by the absence of the sport's leading players and a court battle over potential environmental damage resulting from a new course in Brazil....
